name: The Fifth Hunt
description:
By Adrian Vasquez and Saif Kausar (addrian#7530, Saifphire#8764)

Serve the Alter for 5 days, and earn your independence and freedom!

SLOYD Assets Used:
Mushroom
Tent
Alter
Spear
Bottle

Engine:
Unity

Other assets grabbed from:
FreeSound.com,  Unity Asset Store, and SLOYD

Download zip, and click on unity Icon to start playing!


Play Instructions:

WASD to Move

Left click to charge and shoot

Space to Jump

Hold E to Harvest Yellow items

(Left to sprint and Ctrl to crouch)
